file_content.text: You saved a lot of lives today. Thanks.
My lord. Sorry I don't have time for proper respects. We got men dying left and right up at the border post, and no medkits.
Agent. Can you lend me a hand? We got men dying left and right at the border post, and we're down to our last kolto injections.
Hunter. That weapon work? I need your help. We got men dying left and right at the border post, and we're out of kolto injections.
Excuse me. Sorry to bother. We got men dying left and right at the border post, and we're out of kolto injections.
Organa's got medics by the river for their own men. Someone needs to "requisition" their supplies and take them to the border post, or our boys will die.
I normally prefer not to kill, but it's for a good cause.
Thanks. They don't have much time up there. Please, hurry.
If House Thul falls, the friends of Thul suffer. Remember that and reconsider, please.
Sorry, I don't have time to talk.
